# MKMultiPolylineRenderer

**Class**

A visual representation of multiple polyline overlay objects.

## Declaration

```swift
class MKMultiPolylineRenderer
```

## Overview

Use the multipolyline renderer to provide the styling of multiple polylines that you create using [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKMultiPolyline].

## Creating a multipolyline renderer

- **init(multiPolyline:)**: Creates an object that renders a visual representation of multiple polyline objects.

## Accessing the multipolyline object

- **multiPolyline**: An object that represents multiple polyline shapes, each consisting of one or more connected line segments.

## Multiple segment lines

- **MKPolyline**: An open polygon overlay consisting of one or more connected line segments.
- **MKGeodesicPolyline**: An open polygon overlay consisting of line segments that follow the contours of the Earth to create the shortest path between the specified points.
- **MKMultiPolyline**: A collection of multipolyline shapes, each consisting of one or more connected line segments.
- **MKPolylineRenderer**: A visual representation of any polyline overlay object.
- **MKGradientPolylineRenderer**: A visual representation of any polyline overlay object with a gradient.

## Inherits From

- MKOverlayPathRenderer

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
